Your purchase will be split into 4 payments, payable every 2 weeks

settings.heading: What is AfterPay?
settings.row_content: AfterPay is an option that allows you to purchase a product and pay for it in four installments, one every two weeks, with no additional interest.

settings.heading: How do I use AfterPay?
settings.row_content: Simply shop at damanci.com or through our mobile app, add items to your shopping bag and move on to the checkout page. Here you may choose AfterPay as your payment method. First-time customers will need to register with AfterPay and provide payment details; returning customers may simply log in and make their purchase. It’s that easy!

settings.heading: Where can I use AfterPay?
settings.row_content: AfterPay can only be applied to purchases made at damanci.com or on our mobile app.

settings.heading: Can I use AfterPay if I’m an international customer?
settings.row_content: AfterPay is only available to customers with a US billing address and a US mobile phone number. Customers with a foreign billing address will not be able to set up an account with AfterPa

settings.heading: How does the payment schedule work?
settings.row_content: All customers are required to make their first payment at the time of purchase, with the remaining three payments deducted every two weeks from your chosen payment method. If you choose to make your payments before your scheduled dates, you may do so through your AfterPay account. Simply log in to your AfterPay account to view your payment schedule and make the payment when you deem it convenient.

settings.heading: What happens if I can’t meet an AfterPay installment?
settings.row_content: If you miss a payment you will be subject to delay fees. To get more details see our Terms and Conditions.

settings.heading: When will my items be delivered if using AfterPay?
settings.row_content: AfterPay orders are delivered as per our standard shipping times once your purchase has been fulfilled online. To visit our Shipping page for further information, click here.

settings.heading: Is there a limit to how much I can spend on a single Afterpay transaction?
settings.row_content: Yes, your bag value must be between $35 and $1,000 to use Afterpay on damanci.com.

settings.heading: What products are not eligible for purchase using Afterpay?
settings.row_content: AfterPay is not available for purchases on Gift Cards. If purchasing a Gift Card (or any ineligible items) as well as AfterPay-eligible products, you will need to place two separate orders.

settings.heading: How do I return or exchange and item purchased using AfterPay?
settings.row_content: AfterPay returns follow our standard Returns policy. You may return your AfterPay order via post for reimbursement. Please check that your intended return/exchange item meets our Returns Policy. AfterPay will be notified of your return request and will process due reimbursement. If you have more questions regarding AfterPay returns, please contact AfterPay customer service through info@afterpay.com .

settings.heading: Where can I find out more about AfterPay?
settings.row_content: If you wish to learn more about AfterPay visit their website for a full list of FAQ’s, Terms of Payment and AfterPay Privacy Policy.
